channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
Hello guys, if anybody could answer these 2 questions i will greatly appreciate it.
NOTE: i am usuing IsidiaX as my source.
1. I am hosting my current runescape private server with my PC. I have noticed in the last couple days that everytime I go to school the run.bat is at "Press any key to continue" and the server is offline. This however does not happen when I am at home using my computer. It does not say press any key to continue right away, it takes about 2 hours of me leaving the laptop alone then it would say it. the computer does not go to sleep mode in case you are wondering, it just stays with the charger, the screen wide awake. Should I keep like an auto clicker on to keep it active? Do I need to stay logged in? Please answer <3
2. I was wondering if there is anyway to make a command log on my source. I have seen random people getting banned and i don't know who did it. There is no command log file so I have no idea how to tell.
If anybody could help I would greatly appreciate it, thanks.

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @ImmensePK ImmensePK
item.description:
@ImmensePK wrote:

lol lol

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“ImmensePK, post:7, topic:432277”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=534987.msg3911886#msg3911886 date=1328828852]

Try this if you are using vista…

Go into Control Panel
Go into Power Options
Click change plan settings
Click change advanced power settings
Change turn off hard drives to : Never
Change System standby to : Never

If you are on XP…

Go into Control Panel
Go into Power Options
Change turn off hard drives to : Never
Change System standby to : Never

Also go to Hibernate Tab at the top of Power Options and Un-Tick: Enable Hibernation

Click Apply
Click OK

Voila!

Hope this helped

EDIT Let me know if it worked please lol

im betting his school dosnt have the CPanel open to any student. lol.
[/quote]

He doesnt want to do it on a school computer, he worded it incorrectly, he means when he goes to school and leaves it running on his pc at home, it shuts the server down after a couple of hours, so i think his hard drive is going to sleep, therefore i gave him the fix lol[/quote]

Ah, makes more sence, ha ha.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Daginith:

looks like your school dosnt have jdk installed…

  1. Inactivity most likely, you can change that in your computer preferences.
  2. Try searching google on how to make a pm log, change a few thins, and voila.
